To support an organization-wide migration to Microsoft cloud, INTRALOT partnered with Microsoft to receive Azure training and certification to upskill its people. The learning program received an overwhelmingly positive response from employees, enabling INTRALOT to extract maximum value from its cloud technology. Technical employees were enthusiastically engaged and remained on the cutting edge of their fields.

title: Nimble and Sherweb partner up for growth on the commercial marketplace
executive_summary: Nimble, a simple, smart CRM built for Microsoft 365, unifies information across contacts, email, and calendars into a powerful team relationship manager. Sherweb is an award-winning Gold Microsoft partner with more than 6500 partners, whose value-added cloud solutions help customers streamline operations. Working in partnership and scaling in tandem, Nimble and Sherweb joined together to sell through the commercial marketplace leveraging margin sharing—a new feature where independent software vendors (ISV) like Nimble can create a private offer for partners in the Cloud Solution Provider program and offer the CSP a margin as motivation to resell the ISV solution. It’s a winning integration all around.

title: Novo Nordisk uses mixed reality to improve processes in a GxP environment
executive_summary: Multinational pharmaceutical company Novo Nordisk is the world’s largest manufacturer of insulin and GLP-1 products. It was founded almost a century ago in Denmark. In recent years, the organization has been pioneering the use of new digital technologies to drive growth, reach more patients, and simplify shop floor operations. As part of this mission, they’re currently using a mixed reality solution designed to improve processes at some of the company’s manufacturing facilities. All while helping Novo Nordisk meet the strict requirements imposed on the pharma industry.
products: Dynamics 365 Guides, Dynamics 365 Remote Assist, Power Apps

title: Orange County Superior Court Modernizes Case Management Systems Data to Better Serve Community
executive_summary: The Orange County Superior Court (OCSC) unified data from its disparate case management systems to improve operational efficiency and effectiveness and introduce better data-driven decision making. For more than one hundred years, OCSC managed its case files manually, accumulating more than 70 million critical documents that required physical storage and transport. In 2018, OCSC unified its three disparate case managements systems into a singular data warehouse. With this unified solution, OCSC can leverage data to deliver solutions and explore new opportunities on Microsoft Azure to be a pioneer in modernizing court operations.

title: Grant Thornton UK LLP’s use of Microsoft 365 aids its accessibility ambitions
executive_summary: Grant Thornton is one of the largest providers of professional services, employing 62,000 people in over 140 countries. The UK member firm is led by over 200 partners and employs more than 5,500 people. By combining global scale with local insight and understanding, the Grant Thornton team delivers assurance, tax, and advisory services to businesses and public sector bodies around the world.

title: Rolls-Royce innovates with Power Platform to drive efficiencies
executive_summary: Rolls-Royce pioneers cutting-edge technologies in the areas of aerospace, defence and electrical and power systems. It has placed the transition to net zero at the heart of everything that it does and, as part of that, aims to deliver the cleanest, safest and most competitive solutions to our planet’s vital power needs.

title: Etihad Airways raises the bar for customer service with Power Virtual Agents
executive_summary: For years, Etihad Airways has capitalized on innovative solutions that help offer a seamless customer service experience that makes travel easier and more stress free. New and complex travel restrictions during the global pandemic created a surge in customer inquiries. The team developed a chatbot using Microsoft Power Virtual Agents to be able to respond to all of them. Etihad Airways has empowered its agents with sustainable, scalable tools that helped revamp its customer experience, and improve its net promoter score (NPS).

title: Bethesda Health Care puts patients first with new Bethesda Clinic and Cloud for Healthcare
executive_summary: With the opening of its new Cockburn Clinic, Bethesda Health Care is bringing high-quality mental health services to an underserved section of Perth, Western Australia. To meet its goal of keeping patients healthy at home, Bethesda has built a new patient administration system based on Microsoft Cloud for Healthcare with the help of Microsoft Cloud Partner Program member Velrada. The new system will ensure continuity of care across multiple providers and give patients on-demand access to all information about their care journey. Bethesda expects the new system will improve patient outcomes, increase collaboration between clinical staff, and make the organization more flexible and receptive to the public’s changing expectations for healthcare delivery, while also helping ensure business success.

title: Orange County Superior Court Modernizes Case Management Systems Data to Better Serve Community
executive_summary: The Orange County Superior Court (OCSC) unified data from its disparate case management systems to improve operational efficiency and effectiveness and introduce better data-driven decision making. For more than one hundred years, OCSC managed its case files manually, accumulating more than 70 million critical documents that required physical storage and transport. In 2018, OCSC unified its three disparate case managements systems into a singular data warehouse. With this unified solution, OCSC can leverage data to deliver solutions and explore new opportunities on Microsoft Azure to be a pioneer in modernizing court operations.

title: Grant Thornton UK LLP’s use of Microsoft 365 aids its accessibility ambitions
executive_summary: Grant Thornton is one of the largest providers of professional services, employing 62,000 people in over 140 countries. The UK member firm is led by over 200 partners and employs more than 5,500 people. By combining global scale with local insight and understanding, the Grant Thornton team delivers assurance, tax, and advisory services to businesses and public sector bodies around the world.

title: Rolls-Royce innovates with Power Platform to drive efficiencies
executive_summary: Rolls-Royce pioneers cutting-edge technologies in the areas of aerospace, defence and electrical and power systems. It has placed the transition to net zero at the heart of everything that it does and, as part of that, aims to deliver the cleanest, safest and most competitive solutions to our planet’s vital power needs.

title: Ukrenergo national grid operator improves resiliency with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Ukrenergo is the national electricity transmission system operator that carries out operational and technological management of the United Energy System of Ukraine. To adapt to the era of rapid change and uncertainty, Ukrenergo decided to move forward with digital transformation. The company optimized and automated operational management processes. By implementing Dynamics 365 Finance and Dynamics 365 Operations, Ukrenergo built a transactional digital core and became more resilient in its daily operations to ensure it could adapt to changes in any situation.

title: Virgin Money makes customer service faster and easier with Power Virtual Agents
executive_summary: Virgin Money is a bank in the United Kingdom that seeks to reinvent the role banking plays in peoples’ lives. It prides itself on offering differentiated, digital-first services to customers. Virgin Money sought to improve the support options for customers by reducing the need to call in to the service line. Building on the strategic partnership between Virgin Money and Microsoft, the company used Power Virtual Agents to construct a chatbot that could easily handle common problems, resulting in many queries to the chatbot being resolved without the need for a live agent and over 195,000 interactions through the chatbot each month. Future improvements include AI implementations which will make the company’s chatbot more responsive and useful for customers.

title: Search is a vital skill: How Napier Boys’ High School uses Microsoft’s Search Coach to improve digital literacy and research
executive_summary: Situated in New Zealand, Napier Boys’ High School has been a leading secondary school for over 125 years, blending respect, honesty, and integrity with a 21st century approach to education. Napier’s faculty strives to prepare the boys to become informed and successful future citizens. Nowhere is this better exemplified than in classrooms where educators teach digital literacy and online research skills. However, prioritizing these skills has been difficult given the pressures of the pandemic and the unique rural student body Napier serves. When one of Napier’s technology leaders discovered Search Coach, a learning tool built into Microsoft Teams for Education, he was excited to use this tool to train students how to identify reliable resources and write more useful search queries—to figure out what online sources of information are credible, and to quickly improve their digital research skills.

title: Hi Rez Studios leverages Terraform and Azure to scale gaming platforms
executive_summary: Up through 2018, Hi-Rez Studios ran its core game platform on-premises and at co-location facilities. To achieve the scalability needed for Rogue Company, its latest game, Hi-Rez Studios moved its core platform to Azure Kubernetes Service and Azure SQL, using Kafka for messaging, HashiCorp Terraform for deployment, and GitHub for source control and collaboration. Since then, Hi-Rez Studios has adopted several additional Azure services, open-source solutions, and HashiCorp tools—giving the company a scalable DevOps environment that is benefiting both the company’s centralized back-end services team and its portfolio of game studios.

title: Helping Ingeus build actionable insights with Microsoft Power BI
executive_summary: Covid-19 caused havoc in the jobs market, as employees were made redundant, struggled with health issues, and disconnected from the working world. In the first quarter of 2022, there were almost 280,000 fewer people in employment in the UK compared to before the pandemic, with another 370,000 economically inactive - meaning they are not actively seeking work.

title: Informatica, together with Azure, helps customers to improve data access and increase revenue
executive_summary: Informatica empowers businesses to realize transformative outcomes by bringing their data to life. When properly unlocked, data becomes a living and trusted asset that’s democratized across the organization. Informatica’s Intelligent Data Management Cloud™ (IDMC) enables these outcomes by addressing the most critical data management challenges that undermine customers’ trust in their data, including data discovery, ingestion, data quality, data protection, master data management, and enterprise data governance. Underpinned by its AI engine CLAIRE®, IDMC is the only cloud dedicated to managing data of any type, pattern, complexity, or workload across any location—all on a single platform with a simple and flexible consumption-based pricing model.

title: REVA University races ahead in its digital transformation journey with Microsoft
executive_summary:
REVA University (REVA) is among the top private universities in Bengaluru, Karnataka, India, aiming to transform students into future-ready professionals. Established in 2013, this forward-looking University offers more than 70 programs in various disciplines delivered by highly qualified faculty members, cutting-edge infrastructure, and a focus on research and innovation. The university also provides a vibrant campus life with opportunities for sports, cultural events, and community service initiatives.
REVA is approved by the University Grants Commission (UGC), All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), and accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). According to the QS Asian University Rankings 2023, compiled by Quacquarelli Symonds, the global higher education analyst and compiler of the QS World University Rankings, REVA is ranked sixth among private universities in Karnataka and 47th in India.

title: DEMCO reduces joint use permit processing for 135,000 assets by 80 percent using Joint Use 365 and the Microsoft Power Platform
executive_summary: Dixie Electric Membership Co. (DEMCO), an electric cooperative serving power to over 114,000 customers across seven parishes in Louisiana, needed a better way to manage joint use projects involving DEMCO utility poles. DEMCO selected Joint Use 365 from Varasset Software to support communications companies with broadband buildout projects while streamlining and automating joint use processes. Built on the Microsoft Power Platform, Joint Use 365 seamlessly integrates DEMCO’s existing data into Microsoft Dataverse, automates workflows and activities with Microsoft Power Automate, and enables key stakeholders to make data-driven decisions by using Microsoft Power BI dashboards.
products: Azure, Dataverse, Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, SharePoint

title: Cineplex saves 30,000 hours a year with Power Platform and generative AI
executive_summary: Cineplex is one of Canada’s leading media and entertainment companies. To streamline business processes, over 100 employees are using Power Platform to develop innovative automation solutions for finance, guest services, and other departments. This includes scalable RPA desktop flows with deep integration to backend systems as well as AI-driven copilots. Together, these solutions save the company over 30,000 hours a year in manual processing time.

title: Modernizing interactive experiences across LEGO House with Azure Kubernetes Service
executive_summary: Opened in 2017, the LEGO House in Denmark is the ultimate LEGO experience center for children and adults. In 2023, facing challenges with an array of custom-built digital experiences served from an aging on-prem data center, it began upgrading with Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). This shift to a cloud-based approach improved experience uptime and stability and will enable LEGO House to quickly update and innovate upon these experiences as the house learns from its guests. As the destination modernizes all its interactive experiences it hopes to share learnings and technologies with the broader LEGO Group ecosystem, like LEGOLAND and brand retail stores.

title: Conagra’s commitment to its shop floor workers starts with Microsoft Teams
executive_summary: For more than a century, Conagra Brands has created an array of beloved food brands, from iconic brands like Birds Eye, Slim Jim, Vlasic, and Duncan Hines to new favorites, such as Angie’s BOOMCHICKAPOP and Gardein. With frontline workers at the heart of its mission, and by fusing culinary know-how with data-driven insights, Conagra is on a journey to modernize its shop floor operations with Microsoft Teams and Surface Hub devices. With real-time communication and data sharing, Conagra is empowering its workforce while staying competitive in the Consumer Packaged Goods industry.
products: Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams

title: Pacífico Seguros implementa Microsoft Copilot for Security con un enfoque Zero Trust y XDR
executive_summary: This story originally published in Spanish on March 28, 2024.

title: Detailed summaries and tailored action plans: MultiChoice gets the best out of meetings with Microsoft Copilot
executive_summary: Like many, MultiChoice’s IT Project Management Office (PMO) struggled with managing a day-long chain of back-to-back meetings and minutes. Embracing Microsoft Copilot, MultiChoice’s IT PMO automated meeting minutes, which accelerated project timelines and ensured clear, unbiased communication. Using tailored summaries and reminders, MultiChoice teams make more informed decisions and save time to perform more strategic reflection and proactive risk management.

title: BDO unifies tax and accounting services with Dynamics 365 Project Operations and Copilot
executive_summary: BDO USA has ignited a revolution in project management with its groundbreaking BDO Tax UserVerse on Microsoft Dynamics 365, uniting data and streamlining processes to fuel unparalleled efficiency. This game-changing platform raises the bar for the accounting industry by integrating service lines, maximizing scalability, and refining the client service experience. With the synergy of Microsoft Copilot and SharePoint, BDO unlocks a world of real-time insights and cohesive data management, propelling productivity and fostering innovation. The system’s AI and analytics fortify BDO’s market prominence.

title: Neobank Moneybase makes money simple with Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: “Make money simple,”—this vision led to the creation of a neobank, Moneybase. From the get-go, the entire system was designed and developed with Microsoft Azure in mind. The robust cloud-based environment gave the financial institution the scalability, security, and flexibility needed to offer seamless digital services. Today, Moneybase customers manage funds, invest, and get support, all within one environment. This customer-centricity has earned the company numerous accolades, media attention, and the trust and loyalty of its 40,000 customers.
products: Azure, Azure API Management, Azure App Service, Azure Automation, Azure Backup, Dynamics 365 Customer Service, Dynamics 365 Sales, Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft Intune, Microsoft Teams

title: The eThekwini Municipality optimizes urban safety and water management with Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: Urban challenges, such as ensuring safety and optimal resource usage, require a streamlined approach. As such, the eThekwini Municipality uses technology to achieve these goals. Its Cocity app, which runs on Azure, enables citizens to report crimes anonymously, enhancing confidence in law enforcement. Additionally, eThekwini tackles water loss issues by streamlining data access and management with Microsoft services, generating reports in half the time. This enables proactive leak detection and faster response times, ultimately improving service delivery and resource efficiency.

title: PKSHA leans on Copilot for Microsoft 365 as part of their team
executive_summary: PKSHA Technology develops algorithmic solutions and AI technologies that help companies become more efficient and improve their processes—they believe in the power of algorithms to solve some of the world’s biggest challenges. Through Copilot for Microsoft 365, the team optimizes their time on critical work by increasing efficiency in meeting preparations, data analytics, and ideation. With Copilot, PKSHA releases their products faster and more efficiently, creates better sales presentations and proposals, and improves their customer management.

title: Capita uses GitHub Copilot to free developers and deliver faster for customers
executive_summary: Capita began looking at the potential of GitHub Copilot to enhance its software development in 2024. It had great success during an early proof of concept in 2023 and acted swiftly to promote wider adoption of GitHub Copilot across its software development team. Capita expects productivity improvements as well as improvements in developer satisfaction, recruitment and retention. The business can now deliver faster for its customers, helping to drive faster time to value and satisfaction.
products: Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, Forms, GitHub Copilot, Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365

title: Intesa Sanpaolo accrues big cybersecurity dividends with Microsoft Sentinel, Copilot for Security
executive_summary: N/A

title: Leviatan makes quality and compliance easier and work more joyful through its use of Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio
executive_summary: As a heavy user of Microsoft Teams, Leviatan Group saw the potential of Microsoft 365 Copilot to maximise returns from its existing Microsoft investments.

title: Natural England’s AI for Peat programme aims to restore carbon-rich peatlands with Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: N/A

title: Testing the ID wallet functionality utilizing ‘Microsoft Entra Verified ID’, xID aims for the future of municipal DX with Microsoft.
executive_summary: The ID wallet aimed to solve challenges faced by many municipalities. For instance, digitizing and centrally managing applications and verifications done via paper certificates can expedite and simplify access to administrative services, reducing the workload for municipal staff.

title: Lenovo increases support agent productivity by 15% with Dynamics 365 Contact Center
executive_summary: Lenovo needed automated, AI-based solutions to rapidly manage customer inquiries while streamlining and automating repetitive tasks and enhancing customer satisfaction.

title: Cemig reduced human error rates from 20% to 1.82% using Power Platform
executive_summary: Cemig was looking for solutions to improve efficiency and productivity, facing challenges with manual processes.

title: Health nonprofit ARcare expands care in rural communities with Microsoft Fabric
executive_summary: ARcare provides healthcare in underserved communities across Arkansas, Kentucky, and Mississippi. The nonprofit needed to reduce manual processes, unify its data, and enable advanced analytics so it could enact its vision of healthcare for all.

title: Microsoft 365 E5 and Microsoft Security Copilot: Forging a security environment to protect SHUEISHA creativity
executive_summary: Numerous SaaS apps and digital tools are used in the creative pursuits of writers, creators, and editors, but issues surround the protection of intellectual property. Meanwhile, working styles have been changing rapidly since the onset of COVID-19. These challenges have made it essential to strengthen cybersecurity.

title: Centrica pioneers large-scale transformation in partnership with Microsoft
executive_summary: Centrica is an international energy and services company with head offices in Windsor and is the parent company of British Gas. Centrica has formed a strategic partnership with Microsoft to implement numerous Azure cloud services to ensure its 25,000 staff have the latest technology to help its 25 million customers around the globe.

title: Fortnum & Mason delivers memorable customer experiences with Microsoft Dynamics 365
executive_summary: The iconic Fortnum & Mason has been a firm fixture in heart of London for over 300 years, where visitors from around the world come in search of its exquisite range of gifts, hampers, food and tea.

title: Marks & Spencer speeds up insights with Azure Synapse Analytics
executive_summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) is a leading British retailer bringing high-quality food, clothing, and homeware to 32 million customers around the world, with more than 1,400 stores across 57 countries. When its aging platform couldn’t keep pace with increasing demand, M&S decided to build a new data platform around Microsoft Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Databricks, and Azure Synapse Analytics.

title: Healthcare startup MediView cuts time to market by up to 70%, despite pandemic
executive_summary: Healthcare startup MediView has developed a remarkable product that uses 3D holograms projected either directly on top of the patient’s anatomy or hovering above it to help surgeons see the patient’s internal anatomy and guide them through procedures. Equally remarkable is MediView's path to success, thanks to its collaboration with Microsoft Industry Solutions. From the Microsoft for Startups program, MediView gains technical expertise, no-cost subscriptions and licensing, and business development support—exactly what a growing startup needs.

title: Humana consolidates 47 data sources and BI tools into a singular Power BI and Azure solution
executive_summary: After surveying the analytics professionals utilizing digital health and analytics data, Humana discovered that it had 47 disparate data sources and BI tools used throughout the company. Humana decided to condense its 47 disparate data sources and BI tools to a singular solution with Microsoft Power BI as its main BI tool. While COVID-19 couldn’t have been anticipated, Power BI allowed Humana to create reports and dashboards, form insights, and derive strategy quickly and effortlessly. With Power BI, Humana adapted on the fly and continues to collaborate even as everyone works from home, a critical capability now.

title: L’Oréal is revolutionizing work with Dynamics 365 Remote Assist on HoloLens 2
executive_summary: L’Oréal is well known around the world for the quality and extensive variety of its beauty products—the result of hard work by employees in 150 countries. To help employees be more efficient and productive, L’Oréal deployed Microsoft Dynamics 365 Remote Assist on HoloLens 2 to make it easier to install, upgrade, troubleshoot, and audit manufacturing equipment with help from remote experts in real time. By connecting employees around the globe through mixed reality, L’Oréal is reducing costs, optimizing operations, and cutting down on travel—a benefit that ties directly to the company’s long-term commitment to environmental sustainability and minimizing its carbon footprint.

title: Toyota Ukraine enhances collaboration with dealerships to better serve end-customers
executive_summary: Toyota Ukraine is the official importer of Toyota and Lexus vehicles. It supports more than 35 dealerships across the country, providing services from importing vehicles to supplying spare parts for maintenance or repair. With speed of service becoming the new standard, sharing information with dealerships from manual reports via email no longer satisfied Toyota Ukraine’s standards. The company decided to overhaul its digital toolbox and streamline data exchange from back office to dealerships, using Microsoft Dynamics 365, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint Online, and Microsoft Power Platform.

title: Ste. Michelle Wine Estates crafts premium customer experiences with Dynamics 365 Commerce
executive_summary: Ste. Michelle Wine Estates, one of the largest premium wine companies in the United States, prides itself on superior consumer experiences. To unify its consumer data and provide opportunities for innovation, Ste. Michelle is deploying Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce across all of its wine brands. The company is already seeing better mobile experiences, and it expects that by enhancing its omnichannel commerce platform, Ste. Michelle will increase sales and conversion rates, attract new business, and boost loyalty among existing consumers.

title: Provincial government goes digital to spark proactive civic engagement
executive_summary: Gauteng is among the smallest but most densely populated South African provinces, yet its government is spearheading digital innovation both within the state and internationally. Overseeing 13 departments, the institution serves more than 10 million citizens each day. To provide them with easier access and higher quality of civic services, the Gauteng Provincial Government (GPG) has embarked on a digital transformation journey, working with Microsoft and a local technology partner, building an online citizen platform based on Azure PaaS, Dynamics 365 CE, and Office 365.

title: Minecraft Education Studio: Shaping the future with game-based learning
executive_summary: Today, the challenge for initial teacher education is to empower preservice teachers with the learning tools and expertise to prepare students for a fast-changing world, where jobs involving routine cognitive and manual skills are in decline. The Institute of Education at Dublin City University (DCU) is leading the way with the world’s first Minecraft Education Studio, an immersive space where the game is used as a cross-curricular learning tool to develop critical thinking, communication, and collaboration—skills now considered vital for twenty-first century jobs.

title: Counseling during COVID-19: Arkin maintains close connections to patients with Microsoft 365
executive_summary: It’s Monday morning and Arkin psychiatrist Tjeerd van Rees Vellinga, MD, prepares for an appointment with a patient who has just arrived in the waiting room. Today, Dr. van Rees Vellinga takes some extra time to review medications and put the final touches on some notes about a new prescription. He admits the patient into his office and makes a quick visual assessment of his client’s mood, so he can help the patient relax. It’s the same weekly ritual they have practiced since beginning therapy a year ago. Except that nothing is the same: this session unfolds virtually, with Dr. van Rees Vellinga in his home office and the patient connecting from home.

title: Digital innovation helps to save lives
executive_summary: Alder Hey Children’s Hospital is one of Europe’s biggest and busiest children’s hospitals. Every year, it cares for over 330,000 children, young people and their families for everything from common illnesses to highly complex and specialist conditions.

title: Liberty Group inspires staff-led innovation with Power Platform hackathon
executive_summary: For more than 60 years, financial services company Liberty Group has been offering Africans a broad range of investment and insurance solutions. The company recently held a 24-hour company-wide hackathon on Power Platform, empowering its staff to propose solutions to business challenges. With the winning ideas streamlining key processes, Liberty Group is demonstrating how meaningful digital innovation can start with users.

title: Montgomery County Government (Maryland) uses Azure AI–based Zammo.ai to support successful COVID-19 vaccination program
executive_summary: Conversational AI for automated telephony helps organizations relieve pressure on human contact center agents. However, building conversational AI-powered virtual assistants was a significant challenge for Montgomery County Government, Maryland, which sought an immediate solution to support the increased demand for service during the COVID-19 pandemic. Zammo.ai offered the county a no-code virtual assistant development platform to help build its own bots quickly and efficiently, enabling the county to quickly augment its two different contact centers with AI capabilities. Using Microsoft Azure Bot Service and other Azure AI tools in the Zammo.ai enhanced platform, Montgomery County has gained new conversational and analytics capabilities, helping it build more intelligent bots, faster—and even better serving its citizens during COVID-19.

title: Leaping into a much better world
executive_summary: New College Lanarkshire is one of the largest colleges in Scotland. It operates across Lanarkshire and East Dunbartonshire with campuses in Cumbernauld, Motherwell, Coatbridge, Kirkintilloch, Hamilton and Broadwood.

title: AI plays a core role at Capita
executive_summary: Capita is an international business process outsourcing and professional services company headquartered in London. It is the UK’s leading onshore contact centre operator and a leader in IT services and resourcing. Its clients rely on its blend of private and public sector delivery expertise, helping them to achieve the right outcomes.

title: Kepro improves healthcare outcomes with fast and accurate insights from Text Analytics for health
executive_summary: Kepro makes quality of care and medical necessity decisions to ensure patients receive the right care they need, as they need it, and in the location of their choosing. To perform these activities, health care providers and clinical support teams are required to manually review large case histories to search for specific words and phrases that span a range of medical documents, like electronic health records, medication lists, and discharge summaries. Kepro adopted Text Analytics for health—a healthcare-specific, text-mining AI service that’s part of Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services. The service automates and improves how clinical teams perform their utilization reviews, medical appeals, and quality oversight assessments, by quickly and accurately extracting essential information from both structured and unstructured text. This ultimately helps Medicare and Medicaid recipients receive high-quality healthcare faster.

title: Metinvest achieves blast-furnace efficiency with Azure Machine learning
executive_summary: With a staff of over 80,000, Ukraine-headquartered Metinvest is a major name in end-to-end steel production. Looking to improve the efficiency of its blast furnaces — reducing fuel consumption by controlling the silicon content in its iron — the company started a pilot project with Azure Data Factory and Azure Machine Learning. Having seen its efficiency improve against benchmarks set by industry leaders, the company is now looking to roll out the solution across all its furnaces.
products: Azure Data Factory, Azure SQL Database, Power BI, Azure Machine Learning

title: Rudin Management proactively safeguards operational networks with Microsoft Defender for IoT
executive_summary: Rudin Management Company wanted to prevent system outages and safety incidents in its New York City skyscrapers. It chose Microsoft Defender for IoT, an agentless Internet of Things (IoT) and operational technology (OT) security solution, to monitor unmanaged devices for ransomware and targeted attacks. It also chose Microsoft Sentinel, a cloud-native security information and event management/security orchestration, automation, and response (SIEM/SOAR) solution, to deliver an enterprise-wide view of multistage attacks across its IT and OT networks.
products: Azure, Azure Digital Twins, Microsoft Sentinel

title: Zero Friction delivers frustration-free metering and billing to the energy sector with Azure Cosmos DB
executive_summary: Zero Friction takes a unique software as a service (SaaS)-based approach to metering and billing for heat suppliers, solving major challenges posed by on-premises solutions: implementation can take years, and scaling is costly. Using Microsoft Azure Cosmos DB and other Azure services, Zero Friction created a platform that offers predictability, performance, and limitless scale with two apps: one that helps heat suppliers convert meter data into invoices, and another that helps end customers understand their energy consumption and make payments.

title: The Met Office partners with Microsoft Azure to chart the UK’s path to a Net Zero future
executive_summary: Charting the path to net zero and establishing what the weather is going to look like as the climate changes is a highly data-intensive task. Given these huge technological demands, The Met Office selected Microsoft as its partner using Microsoft Azure, Azure Data Lake and Cognitive Services (AI) to help it deliver the innovation and the compute resources needed to achieve its ambitious goals.

title: Drive for digitization powered by Dynamics 365 Business Central keeps CURRAX fully focused on its winning ways
executive_summary: CURRAX leverages digitization to uniquely provide one-stop shopping on customized drive technology solutions as a partner to Siemens and Flender. The company, started in 2008, believes digitization drives the future—from a product and process standpoint, and from how to effectively run its business.

title: Improving farm productivity using data-driven agriculture
executive_summary: Farmbeats is an end-to-end AI and IoT system for agriculture that enable precision agriculture techniques. In particular, Azure Farmbeats gathers data from sensors, cameras, and drones, to produce actionable insights for farmers. It can extend Internet coverage to the farm and is resilient towards weather related outages or power variability. Thus, Farmbeats system has been deployed at Stewart Dairylands in New Zealand as one generating precision sensor maps of crop fields, animal monitoring, and much more.

title: Microsoft Synapse technology, takes Multichoice analytics to the next level
executive_summary: As Africa’s leading entertainment company, MultiChoice delivers Direct To Home (DTH), Digital Terrestrial Television (DTT) and online video entertainment services through its entertainment platforms – DStv, GOtv, Showmax and DStv Now – to approximately 20 million subscribers across 50 countries in Africa. MultiChoice Group is the parent company of MultiChoice South Africa (including SuperSport, M-Net and DStv Media Sales), MultiChoice Africa Holdings, Showmax Africa and Irdeto.
products: Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, Power BI, Azure Machine Learning

title: Sarasota County makes Reading Progress: How a New Tool is Changing the Way Students Grow as Readers
executive_summary: Sarasota County Schools is a diverse school district that serves more than 41,000 students in and around the city of Sarasota, FL. In 2021, the district piloted Reading Progress, a free tool built into Assignments in Microsoft Teams to help students improve reading fluency. Reading Progress frees up teachers to spend more time on individual teaching by automating an educational technique called Running Record and provides teachers with actionable insights on each student’s progress by collecting Reading Progress data into Education Insights dashboards. For students, Reading Progress mitigates the stigma and fear surrounding reading aloud and allows them to practice independently so they are more confident when they read in class. After months of distance and hybrid education, most students are behind in their learning, with vulnerable student populations even more at risk. Reading Progress has helped students in Sarasota County Schools catch up and embrace reading.

title: Azure cloud-native review sets stage for future-ready Codeit architecture
executive_summary: Because of its impressive growth, Digital Taxonomy—builder of the cutting edge, AI-powered Codeit platform—required a Microsoft Azure cloud-native architecture review of their solution to achieve their goals. Codeit is a tool for tagging and categorising unstructured data and is used by some of the world’s leading companies. Colibri Digital was approached to undertake this review and provide advice, designs, and implementation of solutions to ensure Digital Taxonomy were optimally positioned to meet their targets during the next phase over the next five years.

title: Solliance makes headlines with cryptocurrency news analysis platform powered by Azure Machine Learning, PyTorch
executive_summary: Solliance delivers cutting-edge solutions that fill gaps across a wide variety of industries. Through its recent collaboration with Baseline, Solliance revolutionizes the cryptocurrency trading experience, extracting news insights from more than 150,000 global sources in near real time. To manage Baseline workloads, Solliance brought Microsoft Azure Machine Learning and PyTorch together for maximum processing power and deep learning capabilities. The result: investors can get under the headlines and see which specific news metrics are moving the volatile crypto market to make more informed trading decisions, while Baseline can release new features in weeks instead of months.

title: UK-based Wesleyan completes finance system transformation using Dynamics 365 Finance
executive_summary: Wesleyan, a mutual organization based in Birmingham, England, had a goal of modernizing its 20-year-old finance system. In February 2020, after careful planning, Wesleyan, along with implementation partner KPMG, kicked off a project to upgrade its outdated system to Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance. Just one month after starting the project, lockdowns brought on by COVID-19 forced the firm to move to a virtual workplace using Microsoft Teams. Fifteen months later—on time and on budget—Wesleyan’s finance system transformation journey culminated in successful implementation of Dynamics 365 Finance. Wesleyan met the timeline; a feat made more remarkable considering the pandemic.

title: Blue Radix helps solve the greenhouse aging crisis with Azure automation
executive_summary: Greenhouses around the world are facing a unique crisis. The rapid growth of greenhouses feeding and greening our world is not matched by the number of professional growers. And greenhouse growers are aging. There are not enough people entering the industry to replace the increasing numbers of retiring growers. This places an increasing pressure on a sensitive system. Who will operate these greenhouses in the near future?

title: Old Mutual Applied Intelligence team led with technology to achieve the ultimate customer experience
executive_summary: Old Mutual is a leading African financial services group with a comprehensive range of investment capabilities. They are the industry leader in retirement fund solutions, investments, asset management, group risk benefits, insurance, and multi-fund management. The best way to describe Old Mutual is to say it is a 177-year-old business that operates like a 24-month-old start-up. This approach has been the catalyst to it being an increasingly relevant financial partner to customers.

title: Data is at the heart of FLO operations, while Azure Synapse runs the core of the data
executive_summary: Moving beyond retail with a multi-channel and multi-brand business model, FLO set precedent in scale by migrating its data warehouse to the cloud, opting for Azure Synapse.

title: Fashable reimagines the future of fashion design with Azure Machine Learning and Pytorch
executive_summary: Portugal-based Fashable is here to revolutionize the fashion industry with AI. Unsustainable manufacturing, unsold inventories, and long production cycles are common issues in fashion. But according to Orlando Ribas Fernandes, Co-Founder and CEO of Fashable, they can all be solved with the help of technology. Using Azure Machine Learning, an enterprise-grade service for the end-to-end machine learning lifecycle, and PyTorch, an open-source machine learning framework, Fashable created an AI algorithm that can generate original clothing designs, helping fashion companies to meet customer demand, get to market faster, and reduce clothing waste.

title: The power of partnerships: How Calcasieu Parish School Board has turned tragedy into an opportunity for a twenty-first century education
executive_summary: Calcasieu Parish School Board sits on the border with Texas in the southwest corner of Louisiana. The school district includes approximately 29,000 students spread over 100 square miles, making it the fifth largest in the state. Recently, the pandemic plus a series of natural disasters tested the limits of Calcasieu Parish as a community. Rather than passing the burden along to individual families to navigate the tumultuous situation, Calcasieu Parish emphasized the power of partnerships with government, local industry, administrators, educators, and families. For that, they relied upon the capabilities of Microsoft 365 education solutions. The results have been astounding as this once devastated parish is now utilizing educational technologies to provide a path to recovery for its students and its community.

title: Kinara Capital achieves anywhere accounting with Dynamics 365 Finance
executive_summary: Envisioning a financially inclusive world where every entrepreneur has equal access to capital, Kinara Capital offers fast and flexible loans without collateral to small business entrepreneurs in India. Over the last 11 years, the NBFC, has focused on addressing the credit gap in the micro-small-medium-enterprise (MSME) sector.

title: Daikin Adopts Azure Machine Learning for Internal Competition to Develop Digital Personnel at In-house College (DICT) for Next-gen Business
executive_summary: Daikin Industries, a world-renowned air conditioner manufacturer, has been promoting digital transformation (DX) in its strategic management plan called “FUSION25” for fiscal years 2021 to 2025. Personnel with specialized knowledge are essential to realize DX. In 2017, Daikin established the “Daikin Information and Communications Technology College (DICT),” a unique in-house personnel development organization that provides new employees with two years of intensive training in digital technology. The program is already yielding tangible results, such as the progress of IT utilization initiatives in all business divisions. In 2021, a data analysis competition was held for new employees to accelerate the development of digital personnel. Microsoft is supporting Daikin's measures to promote DX and develop digital personnel in terms of knowledge, technology, and people.

title: System Cleaners streamlines its sales pipeline with iGlobe CRM and Microsoft 365
executive_summary: System Cleaners, a Danish company that supplies open-plant cleaning solutions to the global food and beverage industry, sought a real-time view of its pipeline and greater transparency for customer data. System Cleaners chose iGlobe CRM because iGlobe’s solution seamlessly integrates into the Microsoft 365 platform, creating an easy, digital workflow for the sales management team while also meeting System Cleaners’ requirements. The platform’s seamless integration with other Microsoft products, such as Dynamics 365 Business Central, Planner, Teams, SharePoint, Outlook, and Power BI, has been crucial for Systems Cleaners’ business success in the midst of a global pandemic. With iGlobe CRM, System Cleaners has the digital foundation to manage 2,500 front-end engineers, service technicians, and sales reps, and to use business insights to ensure continued growth.

title: Altınyıldız Classics transforms its customer journey with Azure-powered e-commerce platform
executive_summary: Altınyıldız Classics pioneers men’s clothing manufacturing in Türkiye since 1952. Nowadays, it offers a faster and more convenient shopping experience thanks to an e-commerce platform powered by Microsoft Azure. In the process, Altınyıldız Classics has also gained control over its entire logistics, from supply chain management to shipping. This has improved website performance and sales while lowering operational costs, enabling Onur Uluğ, Online Channels and Marketing Director, to envision endless possibilities for growth.

title: Axon offers technology boost for public safety with in-car Automated License Plate Recognition on Azure
executive_summary: Axon, a technology leader in public safety, developed AI technology to add cutting-edge license plate recognition capabilities to its in-car camera products, which now can identify plates for vehicles of interest and provide law enforcement with proactive notifications and alerts. Axon AI scientists and engineers chose Microsoft Azure infrastructure as a scalable, cost-efficient, and feature-rich environment where they can develop and test AI models. With Azure compute, storage, and PyTorch and machine learning resources, Axon can easily take advantage of the latest software and hardware technology to develop best-in-class AI solutions for its customers.

title: Quality knows no limits: FRÄNKISCHE Industrial Pipes automates pipe production processes with Azure IoT
executive_summary: More and more, industrial companies expect their suppliers to provide a window into production. Gathering and sharing real-time information is becoming a standard part of requests for quotations and thus a success factor for suppliers. The answer lies in connected factories. One company showing how this works is FRÄNKISCHE Industrial Pipes. This SME makes pipes, accessories, and system components for the construction, civil engineering, automotive, and manufacturing industries. And it is investing in connected production with the help of Azure IoT. During production, FRÄNKISCHE Industrial Pipes continuously collects data on which machines, tools, or even workstations have processed a particular raw material or component—including quality assurance purposes. This has led to quicker detection of production errors and a further leap in quality.

title: Hastings Direct migrates Guidewire and other applications to Azure VMware Solution, increasing performance by 1.6 times
executive_summary: Hastings Direct is an insurance company that presents 500,000 quotes a day to roughly 4 million customers for home and vehicle insurance. The company undertook an initiative to transition to a cloud-first, modern workplace and win more business. To improve its market share and deliver better, faster customer journeys, the company moved its workloads to Microsoft Azure VMware Solution. The company migrated one of its core applications, Guidewire, from their on-premises data center to run on Azure VMware Solution. By migrating Guidewire and their entire data center to Azure, Hastings Direct can take advantage of the scale, resilience, and innovation benefits that come with a modern infrastructure. Hastings Direct increased performance by 1.6 times and now handles adjustments 4 and 5 times faster. It has seen a continual reduction in major incidents and positioned itself to take advantage of cloud-native capabilities and innovation opportunities.

title: Herbelin leverages data collected by Dynamics 365 Business Central to deliver world-class watches
executive_summary: The jewel of French craftsmanship, the company bets on data and the Business Central, Power BI, and Power Apps tools to boost its sales and rationalize its production chain. It has a clear objective: to achieve an increase in revenue of at least 15 percent in the coming years.

title: memoQ streamlines global translation services with Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: Efficiency, scalability, and high accuracy differentiate memoQ’s translation management software from others in the market. However, the company faced scalability challenges with its rented physical server setup, leading to inefficiencies in deployment and infrastructure management. memoQ’s solution? Shifting to Microsoft Azure. Now, automated deployments and secure, compliant data management are the new norms. Using Azure not only fortified memoQ’s localization software but also brought about operational efficiencies, enabling the company to build customer loyalty and boost recurring revenues.

title: Nagel-Group embraces a data-driven culture with Microsoft Data, Analytics, and AI solutions
executive_summary: Nagel-Group is one of the leading food logistics companies in Europe. With a unique network, the company creates competitive advantages for its customers, from reliable transport planning to innovative supply chain services in complex warehouse solutions. With many years of experience and innovative thinking, the company of 11,500 employees manages 7,000 trucks, 130 locations, 30 destination countries, and 100,000 shipments daily.

title: CIPIO.ai taps into the power of generative AI to deliver authentic, community driven UGC at scale using Azure OpenAI Service
executive_summary: CIPIO.ai believes the future of commerce lies in the power of a brand’s community. With a mission to help companies connect with their communities of customers, fans, followers, and beyond to drive authentic user-generated content (UGC), CIPIO.ai chose to work with Microsoft and use Azure OpenAI Services to tap into the power of generative AI. CIPIO.ai’s UGC Solution empowers brands to discover content and content creators, authentically engage with their communities, activate and collaborate with the community, execute new content, pay content creators, and analyze the impact of its brand community at scale. Customer feedback shows CIPIO.ai driven UGC outperforms other branded content, supporting authentic content for brands to use in their paid advertising campaigns, social media marketing, and at every stage of a buyer’s journey.

title: Reddit improves accessibility and SEO through Azure Cognitive Service for Vision image and caption generation
executive_summary: Reddit is a community of communities where people can find and share images and other content around their interests, hobbies, and passions. To broaden accessibility, particularly for users who are blind or have low vision, the company decided to find an AI tool to generate alt text for images on the platform. With the help of the Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services product team, Reddit moved forward with Azure Cognitive Service for Vision to support the automatic generation of captions for millions of images.

title: Marks & Spencer enhances its customer loyalty program with Azure Machine Learning
executive_summary: Marks & Spencer is a leading British retailer bringing high-quality food, clothing, and homeware to millions of customers around the world at great value. With 959 stores across the UK and 100+ websites serving customers in the UK and abroad, the company generates and is trusted with a vast amount of data. Its customer loyalty program, Sparks, has more than 17 million members in the UK and Ireland. Marks & Spencer uses machine learning and data science workloads to gain customer insights and take actions to build brand loyalty, like recommending products based on past purchases, sending loyalty emails to rewards members, and creating targeted campaigns. The previous solution for data science workloads relied on many manual processes, and Marks & Spencer wanted a faster, less labor-intensive way to get models into production. The company turned to Azure MLOps v2 Accelerator to speed up development and deployment time, reduce manual processes, and improve the continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) process. This also helped reduce errors and failures in machine learning model production that will ultimately lead to better customer experiences.

title: Microsoft Advertising increases modeling workflow efficiency by 25 percent with Azure Machine Learning
executive_summary: Microsoft Advertising faced resource constraints coupled with increasing computing requirements for training machine learning models, with a potential adverse effect on ad customization. It began to work in Azure Container for PyTorch, a curated environment in Azure Machine Learning, along with using a powerful supplemental set of Azure solutions, including Azure Data Factory and Azure Blob Storage. Through this approach, Microsoft Advertising enhanced automation, improved workflow sharing, and accelerated its iteration of model training—benefiting both internal Microsoft teams and customers alike. The improved processes resulted in a 25 percent speedup during model training and a 37 percent reduction of GPU memory usage.

title: University of Washington efficiently advances cybersecurity education with Azure Lab Services
executive_summary: Cybersecurity courses offered by the Information School (iSchool) at University of Washington (UW) equip future leaders with a comprehensive understanding of cybersecurity threats and tactics. The school sought a new way of assembling and managing its student labs that would overcome the costs and limitations of on-premises equipment. By moving some labs to Azure Lab Services in the Azure cloud, the school enabled students and professors to use lab equipment as multiple virtual machines, simplifying access, reducing administrative costs, and supporting students to successfully meet course objectives.

title: Berlitz empowered 500,000 language learners using Azure AI Speech
executive_summary: Founded in 1878 by Maximilian Berlitz, Berlitz is a language education company that has been at the forefront of language learning for 145 years. In a departure from traditional grammar-based approaches, Berlitz pioneered the immersive method of language instruction, which is now considered the most effective way to learn a language. With over 100 physical locations across more than 70 countries, 7,000 employees, and an online presence, last year Berlitz taught over 500,000 people how to learn a new language. With Azure AI Speech, Berlitz offers a more personalized and effective learning experience for its diverse range of customers.

title: Equinor takes leap forward on energy transition using Azure Machine Learning
executive_summary: Norwegian energy company Equinor ASA is on a mission to drive the global energy transition with the help of innovative technologies. To do this, the organization has launched an initiative to digitalize its gas trading activities and guide decision-making processes around them using data and insights. Culminated with the creation of a machine learning platform, the project is driving long-needed cultural and digital transformation across Equinor – bringing them one step closer to their sustainable pledges.

title: Elasticsearch enables next-gen search with Azure OpenAI Service
executive_summary: Elastic specializes in search technology that helps customers, employees, and organizations find what they need faster while ensuring data security and keeping mission-critical applications running smoothly. Because its customers wanted a managed solution that was easy to operate, secure, and scalable, Elastic built Elastic Cloud using Microsoft Azure. Demand for Elastic Cloud has grown at twice the rate of the company’s on-premises solutions, while customers reap improved efficiency and better search results, by adding vector search tools that take advantage of Azure OpenAI Service.

title: Zimmer Biomet uses novel Azure-based AI model to predict individual patient gait speed recovery outcomes after joint replacement surgery
executive_summary: Zimmer Biomet, a medical technology company with more than 90 years of experience, is leading responsible AI for healthcare with customized algorithms that predict patient gait speed recovery after hip and knee replacement surgeries. The company’s WalkAI™ technology, backed by its broader AI framework, allows patients and clinicians to monitor individual recoveries from knee or hip replacement surgery using data from the mymobility® patient engagement app. By building a robust internal AI solution based on Microsoft Azure, Zimmer Biomet has revolutionized its business and laid the groundwork for future AI-assisted products and services that empower clinicians and patients to stay informed before and after surgery.

title: Energizing the sector: Petrosea boosts productivity through its Minerva Digital Platform supported by Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: For over half a century, PT Petrosea Tbk has stood as an Indonesian energy sector trailblazer, underlined by its absolute commitment to safety, health and environment, quality management, and business integrity. In 2018, Petrosea moved to digitally transform and reposition its core businesses with the Minerva Digital Platform, aimed at enhancing its value proposition. By digitally revamping its data architecture to align with evolving business requirements, it gained enhanced performance and analytics. As a result, the company saw a 15 percent increase in productivity and heightened customer trust.

title: Healthcare for All with Kry using Azure Open AI Service
executive_summary: In the fast-paced world of digital transformation, healthcare companies like Kry are leading the charge in adopting cutting-edge technologies that cut down administrative tasks and allow medical professionals to better focus on their patients’ well-being.

title: McDonald’s China transforms its operations, elevates service levels with Azure AI
executive_summary: To help employees stay at the forefront of business innovation while opening nearly 1,000 new locations per year, McDonald’s China decided to use AI to elevate all levels of customer service, quality, and operational excellence. In partnership with Microsoft, McDonald’s China established an AI Lab to catalyze its AI journey. The AI Lab team chose to use Microsoft Azure AI to support a full set of intelligent solutions based on large language models, natural language interaction, generative intelligence, and machine learning on the Azure cloud platform. Putting its initial focus on augmenting training at the company’s education center, Hamburger University, the team empowered students with AI assistants, enhanced search, and document translation. Now, these AI tools are helping McDonald’s China rapidly optimize efficiency across the organization.

title: Galp Energia: Keeping critical services secure using an xDR Platform with M365 E5

To do this, the company relies on a huge IT network that spans three continents and ten countries. Keeping such a set of critical services secure requires a comprehensive security platform specifically designed to protect it from cyberattacks. Today, this is made possible by a suite of Microsoft products (as part of a holistic platform) that are helping it to secure its operations while also fostering digital literacy across its network.

title: Digital insurance agency, Nsure.com, reduces manual processing time by 60% using generative AI and Power Automate
executive_summary: Nsure.com enables consumers to compare quotes from over 50+ home & auto insurers and buy online in minutes. For over five years, the company has been using Power Platform to automate business processes. Most recently, it has used the generative AI capabilities in Power Automate, including text recognition and sentiment analysis, to reduce manual processing time by 60% while also reducing associated costs by 50%.

title: NETZSCH Group creates single source of truth with Microsoft Intelligent Data Platform
executive_summary: Traditionally, the NETZSCH Group has operated its three main business units independently. The company recently began exploring how AI and IoT data could provide new avenues for growth. As part of that process, it also began looking for a way to unify its siloed data. Adopting the Microsoft Intelligent Data Platform, NETZSCH Group consolidated its data and developed efficient means of refining data quality and sourcing reliable insights. The solution could also lead to the development of new data-as-a-service offerings.

title: Akbank empowers staff to search through 10,000 records in seconds with Azure OpenAI Service
executive_summary: Akbank, one of Türkiye's largest banks, has transformed its customer support operations using Azure OpenAI Service to improve employee and customer experience. Previously searching through answers in a 10,000-article knowledge base, Akbank staff now conversates with an AI chatbot. Generating correct answers 90 percent of the time, chatbot allows customer representatives to easily save up time, in time of need. This enhances quality and accuracy and helps customer support agents save three minutes in every interaction, freeing them up for more proactive service.

title: Power transmission operator ELES gains agility with Microsoft Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Ensuring the lights stay on requires more than competence; it calls for innovation. ELES, guardian of Slovenia's electric power transmission, embodies this spirit. Yet, the company faced a challenge: an inflexible, outdated enterprise resource management (ERP) system. Enter Microsoft Dynamics 365—an evergreen, future-proof solution bringing ELES departments together, fostering efficiency and collaboration. By consolidating data from multiple sources, ELES can make informed decisions quickly. “Given any network or energy supply changes, we can swiftly adapt, maintaining our services,” says Tamara Slapar, Deputy Information and Communications Technology Director at ELES.

title: Dotdigital innovates with Microsoft’s responsible AI to drive creativity and engagement for marketers
executive_summary: Dotdigital are building on the secure foundations of Microsoft Azure to innovate creatively with Azure OpenAI and GPT-4. “It allows them to get inspiration quickly, focus on what matters, improve engagement and provide new ideas for campaigns. But, most importantly, it’s simple and effective,” states Vanessa Golz, Director of Customer Success EMEA at Dotdigital.

title: Sight Machine and Azure empower manufacturers to increase production performance through industrial data, generative AI
executive_summary: The manufacturing sector collects the largest volume of data of any global industry each year, but it only uses a fraction of the industrial data collected in factories. Sight Machine’s Manufacturing Data Platform enables real-time, data-driven operations for global manufacturers to achieve breakthrough performance by continuously improving sustainability, resilience, and profitability.
products: Azure, Azure AI and Machine Learning

title: E.ON Italy cuts costs by 50 percent and gains insight with Azure SQL Database Hyperscale
executive_summary: With national subsidiaries spread across the continent, E.ON is one of the largest energy companies in Europe. The company runs its data and analytical workloads mostly in the cloud, distributed across different data service backends. In 2017, E.ON Italy aimed to modernize its on-premises data estate by moving all data to Azure SQL Database.

title: BeeKeeperAI delivers the secure future of AI development with Azure Confidential Ledger
executive_summary: BeeKeeperAI has developed EscrowAI™, a solution that powers AI algorithm development within a Zero Trust framework. The solution allows the use of sensitive data, without deidentification, to be part of the AI training and testing process. It does this by creating a trusted execution environment in which content is not visible to either data stewards or AI developers, but which delivers verifiable results. By adding Azure Confidential Ledger to EscrowAI to record algorithm and data set relationships for each run, BeeKeeperAI enhanced the solution’s ability to verify results to regulatory bodies.

title: Pangaea Data builds novel AI with Azure to foster collaboration and improve patient outcomes while saving UK NHS £1 billion
executive_summary: Pangaea Data offers a product platform that combines artificial intelligence (AI) and medical guidelines to characterize patients across 7,000 hard-to-diagnose conditions. The platform mimics the manual review process used by clinicians within the context of the whole patient record—not just symptoms and keywords—without transacting patient data. This empowers clinicians in the pharmaceutical and healthcare industries to find and connect to more undiagnosed, misdiagnosed, and miscoded patients across hard-to-diagnose conditions for monitoring, screening, therapies, and trials. Using this approach improves patient outcomes in a financially sustainable, scalable, and privacy-preserving manner, fostering mutually beneficial collaborations between both industries.

title: Five Degrees reinvents core banking with Microsoft Azure–native banking solution suite
executive_summary: Many financial institutions run on decades-old legacy infrastructure and banking systems, creating a huge risk to business continuity. Five Degrees recognized the opportunity to be part of the transformation to cloud-based infrastructure and developed its cloud-based core banking platform. Building and modernizing intelligent banking applications, Microsoft Azure allowed Five Degrees to take advantage of industry-leading technology and a cloud-scale data and app platform to deliver adaptive, responsive, and personalized experiences to financial institutions.

title: Cherokee County School District boosts student engagement and innovation with Discovery Education and Microsoft 365
executive_summary: In 2019, the Cherokee County School District (CCSD) began a journey to incorporate STEM principles to boost student engagement and develop skills for the future workplace. CCSD turned to education firm Discovery Education to prepare district schools for STEM certification and to give educators a framework for problem-based learning. By relying on Microsoft 365 for general access to Discovery Education’s digital resources and on Microsoft Teams for remote learning, the district overcame key obstacles in its path to certification. With Discovery Education and Microsoft, CCSD realized its certification goal in four years, increased student engagement, and laid a foundation for ongoing innovation.

title: Norwegian municipality Stavanger Kommune makes citizen services more efficient with the power of data and OpenAI Service
executive_summary: Stavanger Kommune is Norway’s fourth largest municipality, and consists of around 145,000 inhabitants, served by roughly 11,000 municipality staff. The organization has embraced digital technology, creating a data platform with the help of its partner, Bouvet, and Microsoft. It has also invested in AI and the Internet of Things knowledge and technology acquisition. Stavanger Kommune has used the technology and data to elevate the services it offers residents. Among its innovations is using AI to remove sensitive personal information from data submitted by citizens.

title: Emirates Global Aluminium cuts cost of manufacturing AI by 86 percent with the introduction of Azure Stack HCI
executive_summary: Emirates Global Aluminium (EGA) is on a bold trajectory to become a digital lighthouse for the United Arab Emirates and the aluminum industry worldwide. To achieve this, the company is enhancing its world-class metal and mining value chain with a digital value chain centered around data and AI. The company drastically transformed its manufacturing operations by harnessing a triad of innovative Microsoft Azure technologies—Azure Stack HCI, Azure Arc, and Azure Kubernetes Service—as it established a game-changing digital manufacturing platform. The new platform reduces the cost of image and video analytics by 86 percent and decreases AI response times by a factor of 13. The seamless hybrid cloud architecture allows use cases to deploy several times a day to keep up with today’s business agility and helps EGA pursue more demanding use cases with its Industry 4.0 program than ever before.

title: Boyner triples e-commerce performance using Azure, boosting customer engagement and conversion
executive_summary: N/A

title: BEMO boosts identity protection using Face Check with Microsoft Entra Verified ID
executive_summary: BEMO provides security services to small and medium businesses with up to 1,000 workers. It was using a manual verification process to confirm customer identities each time a high-impact ticket was submitted. This could take several hours, creating delays. BEMO used Face Check with Microsoft Entra Verified ID to create a new verification tool. Testing began with select customers in late 2023. Early results show verification times have shrunk from 5.5 hours to 30 minutes, a 90 percent reduction in the average processing time.

title: Mitsubishi Tanabe Pharma transforms operation in cloud security powered by Azure OpenAI
executive_summary: Efforts are underway to utilize generative AI in business operations. Generative AI, which can generate a variety of contents using learned data such as images, texts, and program codes, can be expected to improve productivity if utilized well. In this context, Mitsubishi Tanabe Pharma has incorporated Azure OpenAI Service (hereinafter, Azure OpenAI) into its security operations to reduce the time required to check incidents and improve the employee security literacy. The company has been using Microsoft Defender for Cloud (hereinafter, Defender for Cloud) and Microsoft Sentinel (hereinafter, Sentinel) to visualize security alerts and event information. They have enhanced these operations with Azure OpenAI.

title: Shriners Children’s expedites patient care with Fractal and Azure OpenAI Service
executive_summary: Healthcare professionals diagnose and treat patients based on information gathered in clinical notes. But oftentimes, these notes are housed in outdated systems. Some are even handwritten and, therefore, difficult to comprehend. For clinicians to treat patients promptly, there must be a more efficient solution and one that minimizes errors.

title: BDO Belgium adopts Microsoft Fabric to analyze key business drivers in M&A
executive_summary: BDO Belgium, a leading accounting and advisory firm, found that its existing analytics solution for Merger and Acquisitions (M&A) reached its limits in terms of efficiency, scalability, and flexibility for providing a detailed picture of its customers’ businesses. BDO developed a data analytics platform on Microsoft Fabric, named Data Eyes. Since moving to Microsoft Fabric, BDO has gained faster and clearer insights into M&A data and a more reliable analytics platform, helping it guide customers to better business decisions.

title: How Dynamics 365 supports Wilo’s path to become the solution leader for a smart and resource efficient world
executive_summary: The Wilo Group (Wilo) is one of the world’s leading premium suppliers of pumps and pump systems for building services, water management, and industry. More than 9,000 Wilo employees in 90 offices create, deliver, and support innovative, smart, eco-friendly products and services to move water intelligently. From water heating and cooling to complex distribution and critical wastewater treatment solutions, Wilo has supplied the world with high-quality, hard-working systems since 1872.
products: Dynamics 365 Customer Service, Dynamics 365 Field Service, Dynamics 365 Sales, Power BI

title: Works agreements and contracts: Nagel-Group uses Azure OpenAI Service to help employees find information

That’s why Nagel-Group now relies on NagelGPT. Employees can pose their questions—currently on the topics of works agreements and sales—at any time and receive an automated response that includes the appropriate reference documents. This saves time, creates efficiency and transparency, and leads to higher-quality answers overall.

Using Microsoft Azure, CBD upgraded its application infrastructure, improving transaction security and speed. Individual customers can now open an account and start banking with CBD in about two minutes using its award-winning mobile banking platform. Additionally, CBD launched a new low-code Corporate Internet Banking platform that was built in-house, thus acquiring full control of digital differentiation, and enabling faster solution development and informed decisions.

title: Insight Enterprises achieves 93% Microsoft Copilot use rate, streamlining business operations to pave the way for customer success
executive_summary: Insight Enterprises (Insight), a leading solutions integrator, is pioneering the use of generative AI in the workplace to fuel business efficiency for its teammates and clients. In 2023 and 2024, Insight became an early adopter of Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365, and the company is expanding its use across the organization. With education and collaboration at the heart of the company’s internal journey, 93% of Insight’s Copilot users are realizing productivity gains in functions including sales, finance, and human resources. Subsidiary Insight Canada earned the Microsoft AI and Copilot Partner of the Year award in 2024 and is translating its experience to pave the way for its clients to succeed with generative AI.

title: Family-owned Berryessa Gap Vineyards empowers its mobile workforce and enhances the customer experience with Microsoft 365 and Teams
executive_summary: Family-owned Berryessa Gap Vineyards has a small but passionate staff that is on the go between its three locations. The company’s reliance on paper messages, voicemails, and desk phone lines led to delays in returning customer and supplier calls.

executive_summary: With only 4% of African Americans in the gaming workforce, the Cxmmunity Foundation aims to diversify the industry by creating educational environments for minority youth in Philadelphia. executive_summary: The UK Home Office, a critical government department responsible for national security and public safety, aimed to modernise its communication systems and streamline workflows.

executive_summary: Swiss Automotive Group (SAG) sought an ERP that would improve operational reliability, efficiency, and transparency in its finance and warehouse activities and replace fragmented, outdated solutions as a standardized, single source of truth.

executive_summary: The Vermont Judiciary (VTJ) wanted to streamline a labor-intensive manual process for entering data into the US National Instant Criminal Background Check System (NICS), a crucial system that is used to determine the legality of firearm purchases.

title: Northern Tool + Equipment powers retail excellence with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Northern Tool maintains a high standard of customer and employee service across its 130 retail stores and wanted to improve staff onboarding, enhance inventory visibility, modernize returns and payment processes, and speed up end-of-day processes.

title: Encino Energy streamlines oil and gas operations with Microsoft Power Platform
executive_summary: Encino Energy was looking for a more cost-effective development platform to streamline operations, including processes that weren’t addressed with off-the-shelf solutions.

executive_summary: Husch Blackwell, a law firm serving the energy sector, was seeing a significant increase in cases. So, it needed a solution to help lawyers increase efficiency, reduce costs, and improve relationships by aiding in the completion of routine tasks.

title: Aichi Board Upgrades Education with 12,000 Surface Pro AI PCs & Microsoft 365 Copilot
executive_summary: Almost five years have passed since the launch of the GIGA School initiative. With the upcoming replacement of devices for teachers, selecting devices that can last until the next cycle was necessary.

executive_summary: BDO Colombia faced manual processes, errors, and prolonged response times in managing internal requests, affecting the experience of its employees.

title: ClearTax supports more than 200,000 first-time tax filers with Azure OpenAI Service
executive_summary: ClearTax helps gig workers and first-time filers in India access their income tax refunds and connect to the financial ecosystem. Its viral generative AI-based platform needed a robust cloud provider to support increasing traffic.

title: Doctolib transforms consultations and doctor-patient relationships with Azure AI
executive_summary: As one of the leading eHealth companies in France, Doctolib empowers healthcare practitioners to focus on what they do best: patient care.

title: Conduent streamlines transaction processing, avoids hours of downtime with Oracle Database@Azure
executive_summary: IT services provider Conduent aimed to minimize operational complexities and service interruptions in its core Oracle environment. The company’s existing Oracle database solutions in the cloud lacked the scalability needed to support high-visibility clients and mission-critical solutions.

title: LALIGA delivers seamless fan experience and AI insights with Azure Arc
executive_summary: Based in Spain, LALIGA is one of the largest football leagues in the world. With LALIGA’s packed stadiums for in-person matches and a vibrant global online following, fast and secure hybrid cloud computing was a must to keep operations running smoothly.

title: With use cases that excel on the phone, Parloa revolutionizes customer experiences using Azure AI
